library(devtools)
data=read.csv("50_Startups.csv",header=T)
View(data)
plot(data)
x=as.vector(data$R.D.Spend)
y=as.vector(data$Administration)
boxplot(x,y)
plot(x,y)
z=as.vector(data$Marketing.Spend)
t=as.vector(data$Profit)
boxplot(x,y,z,t)
cor(data[c(1,2,3,5)])
model=lm(x~y+z+t)
summary(model)
summary(model)$coefficient
confint(model)
sigma(model)/mean(data$Profit)
